argocd.title: ArgoCD Applications
argocd.notConfiguredDesc: Please configure ArgoCD connection in the Config Center first
argocd.appNamePattern: Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens allowed
argocd.gitPathExtra: Relative path from the configured Git repository root
argocd.targetRevisionExtra: Can be a branch name, Tag, or Commit SHA
argocd.destNamespaceExtra: Application will be deployed to this Kubernetes namespace
argocd.helmValuesExtra: Override values for Helm Charts (YAML format)
argocd.selfHealTooltip: Automatically fix when cluster state drifts from Git
argocd.autoPruneTooltip: Automatically delete resources not in Git
argocd.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this application?
argocd.deleteConfirmDesc: Related resources in the cluster will also be cleaned up

config.title: GitOps Plugin Center
config.description: Configure ArgoCD integration to manage application deployments via GitOps. All CRUD operations will be done through ArgoCD.
config.enableIntegrationTooltip: When enabled, applications in this cluster can be managed through ArgoCD
config.skipTlsVerifyExtra: Enable this if ArgoCD uses a self-signed certificate
config.gitConfigDesc: Configure the Git repository for Kubernetes manifests. Applications will use this repo as config source, and ArgoCD will automatically watch for changes.
config.gitPathExtra: Directory path in Git repo for application configs
config.clusterConfigDesc: Enter the target cluster name registered in ArgoCD. Common values:
config.clusterInCluster: The cluster where ArgoCD is installed
config.clusterCustom: Or a custom cluster name in ArgoCD
config.argocdClusterNameExtra: Cluster name or API Server address registered in ArgoCD
config.argocdProjectExtra: ArgoCD project for organizing and managing app permissions, default is 'default'
